reviewText: This series is great to have if you can't find or can't afford to get the original black and white series.  To me, the colorized versions are less clear and more fuzzy than the B&Ws but are certainly better than not having them at all.  I wish Disney would re-release the originals along with Scarecrow of Romney Marsh as these were two of my favorites from the 50's and 60's.
These Disney videos of Zorro are excellent. I usually am against colorization, but the work done here is exceptional, and serves the series well.
Arrived as described.  I love this DVD.  Very fun stuff!  I recommend this to others.  Beautiful quality picture and sound.
